channel.title: DezolutionScape
channel.description:
[center] [i][b][url=http://Basically anothe rendition of VividScape, although i did change alot of things, the basic necessities are still there.
---Alot of people told me delta is basically dead, so if anyone knows what people are into now of days let me know :3]Basically anothe rendition of VividScape, although i did change alot of things, the basic necessities are still there.
---Alot of people told me delta is basically dead, so if anyone knows what people are into now of days let me know :3[/url][/b][/i] --------- [b]Completed Tasks[/b] Fight Pits - working timers Pest Control Barrows Barbarian Assaultt Wings - make you fly Items kept on death Stat Screen Corporal beast Bandos God Correct Specs Correct Godsword stances. 100% Working Spec DarK Bow Double hits 100% accuracy on special Full Statius,Vesta,Zuriels,Dragon Hai, and Full Elite Black added. Spirit Shields added Fire Cape animation Custom Jaill Comand (Hell) Unique to my server only i think. Shops are organized Full Prayer System Vengeance Works D Claws - Spec included Sara Sword - Spec Included Dragon Fire Shield Works Multi-Combat and Non Multi works Stable Economy All Skills work!
[b]Coming Soon[/b] New areas
[b]Pictures[/b]
[img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/tele.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/assaultahh.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/pestcontrol.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/hellzone.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/fightpits.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/corpmofo.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/bandosshit.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/awcrap.png[/img] [IMG]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/Skill.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/spiritshiels.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/statiusetc.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/doomsword.png[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/itemskeptondeath.png[/img] [IMG]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/Interface.png[/img] [img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/agsspec.gif[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/bgsspec.gif[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/wingsfte.gif[/img][img]http://i305.photobucket.com/albums/nn231/xSynysterFenceX/Untitled-4-8.gif[/img]
[b]Facts-[/b] Custom Commands were added. All skills were added in :3 Custom Interface :D! ::hell instead of jail Wing models were not created by me, but by a server i wish to remain anonymous for the reason of hatred. I added the animation,requirements, and stats to them manually.
[b]Suggestions[/b] Im taking all Suggestions so if you see something you think could be better, or think something should be added let me know.
[/center]

item.title: DezolutionScape
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

riku9182:

Not first server with ::hell command

I kind of had to figure that i wouldnt be since it sounds like such a good idea haha!

Thanks for the comments guys! I added a new quest for the SS and edited the exp rate, do you think anything could be changed?

Read full topic

[center]
[i][b][url=http://Basically anothe rendition of VividScape, although i did change alot of things, the basic necessities are still there.

—Alot of people told me delta is basically dead, so if anyone knows what people are into now of days let me know :3]Basically anothe rendition of VividScape, although i did change alot of things, the basic necessities are still there.
